attributes.additional_details:
There has been numerous complaints registered against Altaf Hussain (founder of MQM Karachi) to Metropolitan police London to take action against him as he threatened innocent Karachi people during his telephonic address. Thousands of people signed petitions on various platform against him. Now, Mrs Zahra Shahid Hussein ( vice president of PTI Karachi) has been murdered few hours ago in Karachi and Imran Khan ( Chair of PTI) hold Altaf Hussain directly responsible for this.
We would urge British Government to arrest Altaf Hussain, cancel his British Citizenship as he is spreading killing and violence in Karachi Pakistan. Otherwise many other innocent people would suffer due to his ongoing terrorist activity.

rejection.details: The arrest of an individual is an operational policing matter for the relevant police force.
